00028 class SkMutex : android::Mutex {
00029 public:
00030     // if isGlobal is true, then ignore any errors in the platform-specific
00031     // destructor
00032     SkMutex(bool isGlobal = true) {}
00033     ~SkMutex() {}
00034 
00035     void    acquire() { this->lock(); }
00036     void    release() { this->unlock(); }
00037 };
